title: Genotype x environment interaction and yield stability of soybean (Glycine max l.) genotypes in multi-environment trials (METs) in Nigeria
content:
Publication date: 15 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 19

Author(s): Abush T. Abebe, Adeyinka S. Adewumi, Moses Adeolu Adebayo, Aondover Shaahu, Hapson Mushoriwa, Tunrayo Alabi, John Derera, Afolabi Agbona, Godfree Chigeza
